snippet: Acura markets the RLX as a prestige sedan, and while it adds more space and enough gadgets to fill a Best Buy, its low-key virtues make it an underdog in a class dominated by German luxury brands.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2014 Acura RLX.
lead_paragraph: Acura markets the RLX as a prestige sedan, and while it adds more space and enough gadgets to fill a Best Buy, its low-key virtues make it an underdog in a class dominated by German luxury brands.

headline.seo: Eyes on the Prize, Gadgets at the Ready
